c.t: Subchapter I. Transit Rider Advisory Council.
c.sc: subchapter I of Chapter 23B of Title 50

c.x: "DDOT" means the District Department of Transportation.
"Local transit" means intra-District streetcar and bus service.
"MAAC" means the Multimodal Accessibility Advisory Council.
"TRAC" means the Transit Rider Advisory Council.
